orchestrators.name: Conversation Orchestrator
orchestrators.description: Manages multi-turn conversation strategy, context memory, and delegates to goal orchestrator. Tracks conversation state and user intent across turns.

orchestrators.name: Goal Orchestrator
orchestrators.description: Routes to specialized domain agents based on goal classification. Manages subgoal decomposition and agent selection with SLA tracking.

orchestrators.name: Safety & Compliance Orchestrator
orchestrators.description: Enforces PII redaction, content filtering, and escalation policies. Monitors risk scores and ensures regulatory compliance.

agents.name: Billing & Payments Agent
agents.description: Comprehensive billing support including payment processing, bill explanation, disputes, and payment arrangements. Accesses BSS billing systems and payment gateways.

agents.name: Plans & Features Agent
agents.description: Handles plan changes, line management, feature add-ons, and family plan configurations. Evaluates eligibility and presents personalized recommendations.

agents.name: Device Lifecycle Agent
agents.description: Complete device management including upgrades, trade-ins, orders, returns, and troubleshooting. Orchestrates eligibility checks and order placement.

agents.name: Activation & Provisioning Agent
agents.description: Device activation, eSIM provisioning, number porting, and SIM management. Performs identity verification and KYC checks.

agents.name: Network & Coverage Agent
agents.description: Network troubleshooting, outage reporting, coverage inquiries, and connectivity issues. Queries OSS systems and creates service tickets.

agents.name: Account Management Agent
agents.description: Account settings, profile updates, password resets, authorized users, and account security. Manages account lifecycle and ownership changes.

agents.name: Features & Services Agent
agents.description: Voicemail, call forwarding, call blocking, parental controls, and other value-added services. Configures calling features and content filtering.

agents.name: Home Internet Agent
agents.description: Fios and home internet support including gateway diagnostics, WiFi management, technician appointments, and self-install assistance.

agents.name: Security & Fraud Agent
agents.description: Fraud detection, account takeover prevention, spam reporting, and security concerns. Integrates with fraud detection systems.

agents.name: Retail & Store Agent
agents.description: Store location, hours, appointments, curbside pickup, and product availability. Coordinates with physical retail locations.

agents.name: Business Services Agent
agents.description: Business account management, fleet services, enterprise solutions, and bulk ordering. Handles B2B-specific requirements.

agents.name: Promotions & Offers Agent
agents.description: Current promotions, loyalty rewards, referral programs, and personalized offers. Queries real-time promotional engine.

agents.name: General Support Agent
agents.description: General inquiries, complaint escalation, feedback, and routing to specialized support channels. Fallback for unclassified intents.

agents.name: Accessibility Services Agent
agents.description: Accessibility features, TTY/TDD setup, hearing aid compatibility, and assistive technology support.

agents.name: International Services Agent
agents.description: Travel passes, international rates, cruise plans, and global connectivity options. Manages international add-ons.

agents.name: Connected Devices Agent
agents.description: Tablets, smartwatches, IoT devices, mobile hotspots, and vehicle connectivity. Handles multi-device ecosystems.

agents.name: Wireless Home Internet Agent
agents.description: 5G Home Internet, LTE Home Internet, fixed wireless, and backup internet solutions for residential customers.

tools.name: BSS Billing API
tools.description: Core billing system API for account balances, invoice details, billing history, and itemized charges.

tools.name: Payment Gateway
tools.description: Payment processing for one-time and recurring payments. Handles payment methods, autopay, and refunds.

tools.name: Eligibility Engine
tools.description: Checks upgrade eligibility, plan change eligibility, and promotional qualification.

tools.name: Device Catalog API
tools.description: Product catalog with device specs, pricing, inventory, and compatibility information.

tools.name: Trade-in Valuation
tools.description: Instant trade-in valuations based on device condition, model, and market rates.

tools.name: Order Management API
tools.description: Order creation, tracking, modification, returns, and exchanges.

tools.name: Identity & KYC
tools.description: Identity verification, 2FA, PIN/PUK management, and KYC validation.

tools.name: Number Porting
tools.description: Number porting from other carriers, validation, and port-in request management.

tools.name: OSS Outage System
tools.description: Network operations support for outage detection, ticket creation, and service restoration status.

tools.name: Location & Coverage
tools.description: Geocoding and coverage lookup by ZIP/address. Returns tower locations and signal predictions.

tools.name: Fios Gateway API
tools.description: Remote management of Fios gateway devices for diagnostics, reboots, and WiFi configuration.

tools.name: Appointment Scheduling
tools.description: Technician scheduling with availability lookup, booking, and rescheduling.

tools.name: Promotions Engine
tools.description: Real-time promotional engine returning personalized offers based on customer segment.

tools.name: Fraud Detection
tools.description: Fraud detection and prevention. Analyzes transactions for suspicious patterns.

tools.name: CRM System
tools.description: Customer relationship management for account profiles, preferences, and interaction history.

tools.name: Inventory Management
tools.description: Real-time inventory for devices, accessories, and equipment across warehouses and stores.

tools.name: SIM Provisioning
tools.description: SIM activation, eSIM provisioning, and SIM swap management.

tools.name: Network Configuration
tools.description: Network settings, APN configuration, and device provisioning parameters.

tools.name: Knowledge Base: Billing
tools.description: Vector database of billing policies, fee explanations, and account management procedures.

tools.name: Knowledge Base: Network
tools.description: Network troubleshooting guides, policy documents, and feature documentation.

tools.name: Knowledge Base: Devices
tools.description: Device manuals, troubleshooting guides, and compatibility information.

tools.name: Knowledge Base: Plans
tools.description: Plan details, feature comparisons, and pricing information.

tools.name: Notification Service
tools.description: Multi-channel notification delivery via SMS, email, and push notifications for alerts and confirmations.

tools.name: Usage Analytics API
tools.description: Real-time and historical usage data for voice, text, and data consumption with overage predictions.

tools.name: Credit Check API
tools.description: Credit bureau integration for credit checks, deposit calculations, and financing eligibility.

tools.name: Roaming Management
tools.description: International roaming activation, partner network lookup, and roaming charge calculation.

tools.name: Document Management
tools.description: Contract storage, e-signature, terms and conditions, and legal document retrieval.

tools.name: Loyalty & Rewards Engine
tools.description: Loyalty point tracking, reward redemption, tier management, and personalized reward offers.

tools.name: Workforce Management
tools.description: Agent availability, skill-based routing, escalation queues, and callback scheduling.

tools.name: Voice Biometrics
tools.description: Voice print authentication for secure caller verification without passwords or PINs.

tools.name: Sentiment Analysis
tools.description: Real-time conversation sentiment tracking to detect frustration and trigger escalation.

tools.name: Chatbot Platform API
tools.description: Web chat, mobile app chat, and messaging platform integration for omnichannel support.

tools.name: Social Media Monitoring
tools.description: Social media monitoring, brand mention tracking, and social care case creation.

tools.name: Quality Assurance
tools.description: Call recording, transcript analysis, compliance checking, and agent performance scoring.

tools.name: Network Diagnostics Tool
tools.description: Remote device diagnostics, signal testing, and network performance troubleshooting.

tools.name: Campaign Management
tools.description: Marketing campaign tracking, targeted offer delivery, and A/B test personalization.

tools.name: Compliance & Regulatory
tools.description: PII redaction, TCPA compliance, consent management, and regulatory policy enforcement.

tools.name: Predictive Analytics
tools.description: Churn prediction, upsell recommendations, next-best-action, and lifetime value scoring.

tools.name: Device Protection API
tools.description: Insurance enrollment, claim filing, coverage verification, and deductible calculation.

tools.name: Survey & Feedback
tools.description: Post-interaction surveys, NPS tracking, CSAT collection, and feedback analysis.
